content.detailedDescription:
I'm sorry not speak english.. mientras filmaba a mi hija y su barrilete no ví nada, luego mirando las tres fotos noté esa luz extraña, y cuando ví el video me sorprendí. por favor quisiera que lo analicen, para descartar que sea un problema o defecto de la cámara del telefono celular con el cual filmaba.

fue en las montañas a unos 50 km de la ciudad de salta en el norte de argentina.
content.summary: En el atardecer filmando un barrilete de frente al sol

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at work and clocked on early to start my shift , it was around 6:30 am in mid october 1992. i was fully awake and was not sleepy or tired. 
i walked with a colleague across the front of the loading bays ( for chilled food distribution) , as we reached the far side (7 loading bays widthways away) , we both turned to walk down the side of the building to go to the canteen for a coffee before work.

something compelled me to look to the left, i saw an elongated cigar shaped object hovering above the 2 storey office building , the object appeared to hum and i could feel vibrations from it in the air. the object in more detail was around 50 to 80 feet away and appeared to be around 2- 300 feet in length and around 2 storeys high maybe more. there appeared to me a mist on the top of the object and i can remember making out that the top was not flat and had what looked like aeriels on top of the whole length but very short and uniform . the colour of the object was dark grey like unpolished steel , although the objects on the top were a kind of gold yellow colour.There seemed to be movement in a couple of the windows but nothing i could make out in detail.
i do not remember any lights on the object at all , along half of the length of the object appeared to be round and some rectangular windows like portholes , these were of a darker colour than the main body. the bottom of the object was slightly curved at the ends and almost horizontal along the length

my colleague stood staring with me for about 2 -3 minutes , he said "they're here" . i then got cold shivers and we both ran down the side of the building at full speed to the canteen. we both asked each other did that really just happen? we decided not to speak about it again for fear of ridicule.

i cannot explain this object but i can confirm this was not a weather balloon , nor was it any aircraft i was aware of at the time or now.
i'm not aware of anyone else seeing this either. 

should you wish to clarify any info i have given i am happy to do so.
content.summary: Hovering ufo

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was vacationing in albuquerque new mexico back in 2008 and i took a picture of her walking in a mall in the old town albuquerque. tonight i was looking at our pictures of the trip when i notice two “things” in the sky in the top left hand corner of the picture. i’m not sure what it is but i would like someone take a look at it and maybe tell me what they think it is. i do not have a good program that will blow it up without distorting the picture. thank you
content.summary: Was on vacation in albuquerque new mexico when i took the picture.

content.detailedDescription: Friend, who is a former army special forces and now attorney, and myself, a retired rn and now music business executive, were driving to his home in a rural area of the largest rural county in tennessee. he noticed the lights in se sky and commented on them as being unusual~ something he hadn't seen before. i too, hadn't seen anything like them. as we drove down the dark country road to his small farm, the object seem to be slowly moving across the sky and rather than park the car when arriving home, we drove to the back field of the property which is flat and unobstructed by trees and other topography. we get out and sit on the hood of his car and watch over the course of an hour as the craft accompanied by an identical one track across the clear spring sky. we decided the second craft was behind the first upon initial siting. he asked me if i could hear anything. i listened and noted outloud that the crafts, based on size and relatively low altitude should be projecting engine sounds. he agreed and this is the first thing that seemed objectively odd. secondly, the speed of movement, again , based on altitude and size of the crafts seemed to defy what he and i know of physics. the track across our line of sight of approx. 25 miles seemed too slow..Which suggests they were beating the laws of gravity. the arrangement of the triangular lights and what appeared to be a shadow of a structure of craft of more square or rectangular shape , dark in color was another oddity to us as we both know something of the necessity of spherical shape to make an object's aerodynamics compatible with flying. i was a part time high school advanced math substitute teacher and know enough to know, i can't explain the aerodynamics of these craft and neither can my friend who jumped from planes during first gulf war. before they reached the horizon to the ne (towards nashville, tn), they vanished. no descent to land. no machiv verticle ascent to the stars. simply vanished. higher in the night sky, during this event we noted the path of 2 commercial aircraft at altitudes well over 25-30k ft, and even they ,upon passing directly overhead, could be heard on that night. there is an af base in the general direction from whence they came, but operations are rare and involve large cargo carriers. the nashville bna airport is ne but the crafts vanished well before a probable descent there. in fact , since weve observed that no commercial craft can be seen making its descent, day or night from this location as we are simply too far away and we've noted that there is an altitude difference roughly half way between this location and nashville bna airport where we are just above sea level and the airport is slightly more than us.  we were not scared or did we fear for our safety. the craft did nothing to suggest we were of note to them. we are neither skeptics or believers of ufo's though since we've discussed the possibility the military may have developed crafts that can only be tested at night. but, the lack of noise? ive asked around...This is an oddity noone can explain. the ability to be have such mass and yet move that slowly at an altitude no higher than a helicopter? odd.
content.summary: Two aerial crafts delineated against night sky by lights of triangular pattern move above us

content.detailedDescription: Back porch of home. sitting in chair.  facing west.  color of object was obvious against night sky.  a triangle, possible fire works display object? it was simply hovering.  i stood to get closer look.  when i sat back down, it was obvious object was descending.   i asked other person on porch with me if they saw anything.  object descended below trees.  oddly i live in what i term the twilight zone.  actual time zone i live in is eastern.  object was in central time zone, i guess.  i live 3 miles from actual time zone change.
content.summary: Object was hovering in night sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were outside on her back deck. we were just dancing and fooling around when we looked at the sky and saw something circular looking flying through it very fast. we noticed it because of the lights, they stood out against the dark sky. right when we saw it, we thought it was a ufo, there's no other explanation for what it could have been. now here's the details. it had three lights on it, red white and yellow. it was totally silent, however my friend said she heard one beep. it dropped straight down into the trees and we couldn't see it anymore. then another one flew across the sky, faster than the first one, following the same path. it also went down below the tree line. my friend says she saw a third however i didn't. we were kinda scared and surprised. we ran and told her mom after they all disappeared. we lost sight of them when they lowered into the trees.
content.summary: On back deck, saw circular/disc looking object, had 3 lights, red orange and yellow, went down into the treeline and lost sight of it, there were 3

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting at the busy 5 corners stoplight in niagara falls. an intense ascending orange ball of fire rose from between 2 buildings 125 feet in front of my vehicle and got more intense and larger -then split into two orange balls of fire. they were bright as magnesium burning. the 2 orange balls then appeared as orange cockpit windows on the front of a craft, split like
an army helicopter and it became an entire craft. two occupants could clearly be seen standing at what looked like panels-lecturn shaped control surfaces as it flew above me.
they were human shaped amd stood about 6 feet tall. i was only 125 feet from
craft when it materialized. it was a white shaped polywog with no sound
and no signs of propulsion other than the two long orange light bars on the belly that would pulse one than the other. i had pulled my car over around the corner to watch and the craft literally flew over me and a friend who strangly has memory loss on this sighting. the craft materialized out of thin air yet it was clearly manufactrured somewhere my someone /something yet it had no seams or rivits on the fuselage. the craft flew in a north easterly direction and i could literally watch it fly slowly towards lewiston ny until 
it was so far i couldnt see it anymore. it maintained a ne heading at an constant altitude of about 300 feet. as a retired mechanical machine designer
it was clear to me that it was a manufactured craft -yet not by common earthy manufacturing aircraft processed and it clearly materialized from thin air.
content.summary: Polywog shape -2 long bars amber pulsating light on belly-split windows -2 humanoids

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving home and saw above in front of me for approx 2 seconds a massive object shaped like a plane but more sculptured like the shape of a pigeon gliding.
it was massive approx 4 times the size of a normal plane there was no noise and the clouds were low i was stunned and shocked by the size and beauty of this object it then just disapeared into the cloud, there were no markings at all and the colour was an aluminium silver.
the time was approx 3.50pm and a member of my staff was with me we could not
believe it.
i am a great believer in ufos and i can now at last say i believe i have seen one
content.summary: Was driving home and saw this massive triangular silver shaped object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I cannot recall exact date that i actually observed these most unusual circles. but approx. three years ago, i walked out onto my back deck and saw two perfect circles side by side and perfect in diameter. approx. 30 feet in diameter. i noticed that inside of these circles that all grass, veg. was burned and killed. i noticed no other disturbance other than inside of these circles themselves. i showed my husband and two children. they all had no reason at all as to why these circles would be in the lower bottom of our yard, and i was told by them to "just forget about it". i watched the circles over the last three years and have found that very little grass has tried to regrow, but the circles are still very pronounced! still almost as perfect in diameter as they were at the time they first appeared. i have been trying to just "forget about it" and go on with my life but a voice inside me is telling me to report this, yet something else seems to have had me put it off as well. but there are other more important things that occured during the time that i first noticed the appearance of these circles. not sure if the following was prior to, during, or after my noticing these circles. i was having very lucid dreams. or shall i say nightmares or night terrors. i will describe two of these "night terrors" or "dreams". 1.) i was advancing through a wormhole in space. my leg was hurting while i was having this "dream", and i awoke with my leg still in pain. 2.) in another "dream" during the time of noticing the circles in the back yard, i was "swept" up in an unusual but smaller "pod" (not from this world). i entered the pod alone, but felt the spirit of my youngest son with me. there were two long benches that curved the inside of this "pod" and as the pod "swept" up away from the ground, i looked down and saw the earth being destroyed. next, i was in "space", and i saw very bright light everywhere, very very bright light. at this same time, a man appeared sitting across from me in this "pod". he was dressed in a white gown, and was a male with long dark blonde curly hair. he did not say a word, but i was being taken to another planet where i saw what looked like a small city..Monorail like transportation. i assumed this is where i would be living. i had other "dreams" or "visions" of world ending events, and dying and feeling "at peace". i would very often awake from these "dreams" screaming, crying, dis-oriented, and did not recognize my own surroundings. i was also struggling with high anxiety and depression. i was scared to go to sleep. these "night terrors" would debilitate me! also for some bizarre reason, i am terrified to enter my bathroom at night, which if you look out of the blinds you can see the strange circles that were left. since all of this has occurred, i and two members of my family have been struck with diseases similiar to lyme. i was diagnosed with rocky mt. spotted fever. two years ago, but i also have symptoms of lyme disease. my son was diagnosed with lyme disease and my husband, although not diagnosed is having more severe symptoms. he spends most of the time outdoors, doing the lawnwork, etc. i would love for you guys to come and take some soil samples, and try to get to the bottom of this very odd occurrence, as i would like to have some answers as well, as to why or how these circles appeared, and if my night terrors, or what seems to be "ptsd", is at all related to this. your help is greatly appreciated! i have put this issue off long enough now. it's time to get answers! i do not have internet at my home, as it is in a very rural location. so please contact me via phone. thank you!
content.summary: Walked onto back deck & discovered in bottom of back yd two perfect circles, side by side, touching one another,  approx. 30 feet in diameter. all veg. dead. were many other unusual experiences happening around the time the circles were discovered.

content.detailedDescription: While watching turkey vultures glide in the sky, i observed a kite like diamond shaped object. barely visible, seemed translucent. watched it disappear in the clouds. no sound.. no lights..
content.summary: Translucent kite/ diamond like object

content.detailedDescription:
On july 18th, 2015, at 11pm, my girlfriend and i were traveling down highway 16 east out of newark ohio. as we passed by dayton road, i saw a red light just above the tree line. it was an unusual red color and i pointed it out to my girlfriend. i was not sure what i was looking at. as we drive down the highway our path brought us pass it. i lost sight of it but my girlfriend could still see it. she then claimed it turned colors from red to purple then back to red. we lost sight of it the further we drove. i was confused as to what i could be seeing. it was too low in my mind to be an air craft and the light was not blinking or flashing to indicate it might be a plane. and the red color was a reddish orange. and when my girlfriend claimed the light turned purple it was very curious. we decided to turn around and investigate the light. 

we traveled back in search of the light but could not find it where we had last seen it. so i decided to take a road that would have brought us closer to where i thought it might have been. we turned down staddens bridge road and as we did i spotted the light again. this time it appeared to be over the licking river. we pulled onto the bridge and stopped to watch the object. it was a bright red and moving at a slow pace. it seemed to be moving up the wood line on the south side of the river towards us. it then turned north and began to slowly cross the river. the light was bright red and yellow. the reflection of the sphere could be seen on the river as it passed. it was then i pulled out my phone and tried to photograph it. we watched it until the object crossed the river and we started to lose sight of it behind the tree line. i quickly drove down the road to a clearing where i knew there would be no trees to obstruct our view. it was maybe 60 seconds later when we arrived at the clearing and we spotted the object again, this time though it was just a red dot of light quickly traving north away from us. we watched it for approximately 5 more seconds before it was out of sight completely. 

we continued on our way home and i tried to think of what it could have been that we saw. i ruled out modern craft due to how slowly it moved in the beginning and how low it was. there was also no sound coming from it. there was a storm that passed through a while before and there was lighting in the sky and thought it might be some kind of plasma orb. i don't know much about that phenomenon but thought the sighting lasted too long for it to be that. pluse it was a solid orb of light, there was no variation to its shape as it traveled. we discussed it further and we're just confused by the whole experience. the pictures i captured were terrible and does not show the red light the object was emitting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Spotted an orb of light over a river.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down my road around 10.30pm, i was about halfway down when suddenly this craft/ufo with a wing span/s of nearly the width of the street, and so low it was just above the rooftops of the houses and was coming towards me!!! and then even more incredibly i saw there was another identical one just behind that appeared to be following it. there was barely any if any noise and both were moving very slow but seemed to be able to hover. 
i was transfixed as they were so big, then they i was the only car driving down the street and 'it/they' must have seen me. then they both 'glided' off to the left over the houses at the top of local park. i couldn't see any cabin or even the shape or body of plane, just the huge big white round lights, four altogether, two on each side of the wings? also it has smaller red lights (see crap drawing) underneath.It was awesome! but freaky anyone seen anything like it,? know what it could be. 

afterwards i felt very physically and mentally energised which could have been the shock excitement of seeing them. had i not been so transfixed i may have had time to take a photograph on my phone but by the time i had gathered my thought they just glided off. they were huge. my instincts were this was military rather than et because of the red lights, it seemed to be too uniform. i put it on facebook and it was picked up by the magazine 'cardiff life' interestingly a friend in sudbury on thames posted on facebook that's he had seen the same crafts.
content.summary: Very large street width craft with four large white lights with smaller red light underneath

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my balcony again and i look up the stars of heaven and saw one of the object star can move but it is just now jupiter far away with no flash repeat so it look like star but no flash could be the sun shine on it when it moved. 

then it is at 7:58pm around house area at taman sinar baru lorong kenawai 7d passing by fly to eastward but almost face north-east but more to east side.

i feel strange again and it flew eastward over my forest area until i cannot see from the balcony.. this object passing by the many stars around it
content.summary: Ufo passing by at 7:58pm around house area at taman sinar baru lorong kenawai 7d passing by fly to eastward but almost face north-east but more to east side.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard and noticed what i thought was a black balloon slowly rising, it stopped just above tree line, hovered for about 10 sec. then accelerated rapidly out of sight horizontally. i was having doubts about what i just saw when a second orb came over my head @ about 40 ft. and followed the first orb
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ascended slowly, accelerated horizontally out of sight. second orb came from behind me and followed same path as the first

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside my place seen a flashing light and looked at it for an hour. took a picture of my compass on my phone to get the exact location. i told 3 people in text and they seen it also. pretty neat and peaceful energy.
content.summary: Awesome

content.detailedDescription: I was with my aunt smoking a cigarette in her garden and i always look up in the sky and we both suddenly saw this two bright spots on the sky and they looked like two more stars but then they started making fast movements through the sky it seemed very misteryous to both of us
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Like bright spots that were flashing in the night sky looking like two stars.

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a bright pulsating light out of my bedroom window. i got up out of bed and went to the front door which is right next to the bedroom window.  as i observed the light just hovering and pulsating ( occasionally dimming completely out) another 2 lights exactly like the first appeared.  the other 2 seemed to interacting with each other. i then got my telescope for a better look. the first light slowly moved to the right then continued to hover again. it looked to be a dark object (seemed disk shaped but can not confirm) with blue and red lights (sometimes changing to white)on the side with 3 lights the center. the other 2 lights continuously dimmed in and out while 1 slowly circled the other.

i am still observing the lights right now (1:05 am)  the first of the lights has appeared in the same spot again pulsating, getting brighter then dimming out.  pics were taken thru the telescope.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 unexplained pulsating lights hovering in the direction of lax

content.detailedDescription:
Got off from work and decided to grill a hamburger on my grill in the back yard..It was around 2330 hours when i caught a glimpse of an unusually bright green ball  of light.I thought it was a helicopter but as it headed in a southern direction towards me it stopped turned red then back to green.It went left then right ,made a quick ascent upwards then came back down and hovered.It changed to a row of white lights then back to a green then bluish then a red glow.It looked disc shaped from what i could tell in the darkness.The object was about 300 to 500 feet away but i could clearly see it and watched it for about 3 minutes or so.It stayed around the same area hovering and moving left and right then it moved in an easterly direction and went out of my sight as my house roof blocked my view.I went to the front yard and saw it pass over a tree line and then disappear.
 within a couple of minutes i heard a helicopter coming from the south and saw its yellow white light and it passed to the east like it was looking for something.It then hovered for many minutes to the east of me about half a mile away before going back the way it came.The ball of light i saw was no helicopter or airplane.
i guess it could have been some sort of hovering drone but it seemed large and cannot understand who would fly such a thing that late at night.
content.summary: Saw a green ball of light that changed to red then had a row of white lights hovered above tree line,ascended, descended..Made no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was at home searching google earth for an nazi base in antarctica when i came across the crash site. i noticed a row of white dots in the shadow of snow covered mountain, zooming in on the objects, i found triangleular shaped ship that looks like it had crashed, i tried to save it on my phone when i hit the current location button, and it sent me to my home location. a halve an hour later, i found the crash site again. sent picture to mufon editor, now i'm filing a report.
content.summary: Crashed ufo found on google earth in antarctica 72 36'51

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch, the object appeared. it was a glowing orange oval shaped orb-like object traveling (by (estimate) around 3-4 hundred mph. i reported it to the two rivers police dept. then i went back out to my porch and another object identical to the first one flew by in the same pattern, elevation, and direction as the first one. i then called the us coast guard to report it, as my city is right on lake michigan. to my surprise, the us coast guard person on duty told me that he and another co-worker (also on duty)saw the same 2 objects! they watched the 2 objects fly out over lake michigan at tremendous speed and suddenly disappear. they dismissed them as chinese candles (both objects were moving very fast) and there was no wind at all this night. i was looking at an airplane in the star-filled sky when the first object appeared. i noticed the airplane was much, much higher than the 2 objects, and normal airplanes have red beacons with lights as well. the 2 objects were just glowing orange oval orbs (mostly round in shape with a hint of oval). local regulations call for personal aircraft to stay above 2,000 feet of the surface in my district, and these 2 glowing balls were way below 2,000 feet elevation. i would guess them to be traveling at about 500-600 feet elevation. i know what i saw, and the 2 us coast guard personnel on duty at the time confirmed it (they saw both objects too). this is a life-changing event for me because i am a sceptically defensive person. i believe what i saw were 2 bona-fide ufos. i am 51 years old and this is the first time i've seen anything like what i saw. please contact the us coast guard in my city for verification or more details @ ([phone number removed/cms/tg].  regards....[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: 2 glowing orange orbs following same path

content.detailedDescription:
While i was outside observing the stars and enjoying the cooling night air, i observed two objects that had orange orbs at their fronts and a blinking white strobe at their rear fly by from east to west at an elevation of 15 deg. off the horizon. i have frequently observed these objects before in my area several times,and they are not helicopters. they make no noise, and the orange ball of light at their fronts remains at a constant bright orange illumination no matter the direction that they are flying from.
after i observed two of these objects fly by in succession, i also observed an obvious airliner approaching from the east going in the same direction as the orange orbs.
then, out of the corner of my eye, i spotted an object traveling silently and without lights of any kind, going from the west to the east at an elevation of 15 degrees, at an altitude of about 2000 feet, at a steady state speed that would be faster that a high flying airliner, which often pass over my location. the object made no obvious noise, it passed right by the orange orbs at around the same altitude, but going in the opposite direction. it was also headed towards the approaching airliner, which was flying at a cruising altitude for a normal airliner which was much higher than the object was.

the object was diamond/kite shaped, with the point of the long end pointing towards the ground, or slightly to it's rear opposite of it's flight path.
the exact shape was that of an elongated diamond, or of a very narrow but long diamond shaped kite. i viewed the object as if the flat side of a kite would be facing directly towards me. the color of the object was white with a hint of silver, and non reflective, but it was reflective enough to the point that it could be highlighted by the available starlight alone, so as to make the object, its exterior, and it's outline completely visible to me. i watched the object fly by for a total of around two minutes or so, until i lost sight of it as it flew behind some trees at the end of my street.

the object was very large, but easy to miss if a person was not looking in that specific direction and location at that specific time, because it was completely silent and completely unlighted. and it was definately diamond shaped, and it was not a weather or other balloon, or a group of balloons tied together, or a weather balloon.

the weather was completely clear, with many stars easily viewable, especially for my location in the suburbs near a major city. there was no moon, ans it was extremely dark for a summer night. there was an extremely light and very thin wispy slight cloud cover in the night sky, very sparse, and only in one or two distinct spots, located at the uppermost extreme heights that clouds can exist in the atmosphere. the wind was blowing out of the north nw at 7 mph or less, which would mean that the object would have been traveling crosswise to the wind direction, the temperature was 67 degrees, the humidity was 64 percent. this was after we had a rather extreme daytime temperature of 90 degrees and near 95 percent humidity.
content.summary: :rjl} diamond / kite shaped silver white object observed flying without lights silently west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to check the son's dog. observed a bright light in eastern sky that changed direction and speed several times.
about 30 minutes later, same thing. dog started barking and observed some type of object. 
both went to a southwesternly direction at high velocity after making severe course change.
content.summary: Very bright light, changed direction and velocity several times

content.detailedDescription: I had been drinking wine. (i know this diminishes the report) was relaxing in my recliner. i looked down at my phone to check email and messages ad when i looked up (towards tv) there were 3 classic 'greys' standing before me. i freaked out(fear) and threw any object i could grab at them. they floated sideways through the door going outside. out of an angered fear i opened the door to go after them. they hovered over the power lines and faded out. the commotion caused my neighbors to call the police. they came and i told them what i saw and what the noise was about. i have never been this scared. i live alone and am nervous. i have always been interested in this subject, and have regular dreams about aliens. a few days earlier, i was showing my next door neighbor where a cowrker claimed to see a ufo on pickpocket road in the near town of brentwood. i do cartoons about aliens and don't expect to be taken seriously. it is what it is i guess.
content.summary: 3 entities looked at me and seemed freaked out that i was freaked out

content.detailedDescription: 1pm july 19th, 2015. cloquet, minnesota. my boyfriend and i were driving home. i often gaze up at the stars on our night rides. i noticed two red and white blinking lights that i would have thought were stars if they weren't moving. they also blinked with more or a pattern a strobe party light would use. then they would dim and stwrt rapidly blinking again. i saw a minimum of four of these small star like blinking moving lights. they did not move in a straight line. it was more of a random path. there were also a few more steady in path and light star sized lights with no blinking, same colors, moving east to west.When we arrived home and went to go inside i looked up at the sky again to see a dark boomerang shaped object with three circular lights flying away from us in direction. i did not point it out because i thought it was an airplane at the time. after thinking more about it i realize i have never seen a plane that looked that way before. i had pointed out the random blinking lights to my boyfriend in the car but he did not see them. he is tall and was driving so it wasn't the best time for him to search the skies anyway. when we did go inside our roommates friend asked us what we thought of ufo's and i was surprised and told him what i saw tonight. he said he had seen lights on the sky too tonight and on other occasions.
content.summary: Four or more separate traveling and blinking white and red star like lights. blink had a strobe light patten. 1 boomerang object. three orange lights moving away.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting out of car in   the parking light...And from acros the streets round large ball of light appears the moment i close my door to my car...It shot a straight beam of light in which scared me so much i tried to move around my car and walk inside my house...But the light change from a beam to a round ball of light in which followed my movements then i ran back the other way round my car to see if the light wad moving in the trees...Please contact me as soon as possible...It scared me so much....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was getting out of my car and from the park across the street a light shined on me and followed me

content.detailedDescription: For the past two nights we are looking at these star like objects hovering and moving about in a small area they don't seem to go out of this area but as i'm writing this they are there and i simply cannot explain they will be out there all night as they were last night.And probly will be here tomorrow night.I first noticed them when i was just looking at the stars and noticed that some were dancing about.Its really freaking me out.I have seen other unexplainable things off my deck before a few years back. just don't no what's going on up there but makes me uncomfortable! i cannot take photos or record iv tried with my phone just won't pick them up sucks!
content.summary: They are there again tonight.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving my friend's house, walking to my car, and i noticed the neighbors were outside their house i was confused as to what they were doing. i thought maybe they were looking for a lost dog that had just ran down the street. so i looked down the street and then i noticed the black object in the air. my first thought was "no way, is that a ufo?" i wanted to ask the neighbors if they were looking at the object in the air but i felt embarrassed to press the issue since my friend and his family were right there outside of their house too. half the family was getting into their car to leave the house. 

i got into my car and parked one house down the road, closer to the object and facing it's direction. i messaged a friend saying "i think i see a ufo." i then started to record the object from within my car. my windshield was dirty so that didn't help. i noticed something show up on my screen, on the left side, when i was recording and then it was gone. i only saw it through what my phone was recording. i couldnt tell if this object was a bug on my windshield or something else in the sky. i did not see this while i was outside of my car. 

the black object seemed to be mostly stationary and it looked like it was changing shape. it was kind of spherical but it looked cashew shaped too. it looked like it was rotating as well. i called a friend to tell them about what i was seeing but they did not pick up. by this time i was a block away from my friend's house and i had lost view of the object. i stopped looking at it when i looked at my phone to call my friend. houses and trees were possibly in the way or maybe it was gone. i tried finding it again but i couldn't find it. it was getting dark outside too. i drove back home after about three minutes of trying to get a better view while not driving back in front of my friend's house.

i didn't feel scared. i was in awe and confused as to what it was as well. at the same time i felt embarrassed to even be looking at it since my friend and his family were right there. i didn't want them asking me what i was doing.
content.summary: Black object in the sky. it looked like it was rotating/changing shape. mostly spherical and cashew shaped.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife after eating, walked out of the truck stop. we were walking back to our truck. we walked by 4 other drivers who were talking. about 100ft or so to the north of us, we saw a disk close to the size of 2 football fields raise above the trees. it made no noise and moved real slow; so slow it appeared to almost be hovering. it moved to the east for about 20 minutes, then tilted in an upward trajectory and sped off so fast that it was gone up into space in 4 or 5 seconds; all the while never making a sound or stirring any wind.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw it raise above trees then take off.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work on a weekday morning at wichita city hall in the late 90's.  i was almost there, and i started at 7:30 am, so it would have been about 7:20.  since it was summer the sky was clear and blue.  the sun was coming up, there were no clouds, no airplanes and the stars were gone.  i noticed a small, bright shinny point of light high up in the sky.  i wondered how a single star could be so bright when all the other stars were gone.  then i thought it might be a high airplane reflecting the rising sun.  but i watched it for several minutes and it didn't move.  a plane would have moved across the sky.  then a small puff of gray cloud came out of it from one side.  i thought that was strange, but then the cloud suddenly grew very large, covering most of the sky, including the object.  i don't know what happened after that because i had to go inside to work.  i suppose it could have been a weather balloon, but should have been moving and couldn't hold so much cloud material, as the cloud it created was quite large and growing.
content.summary: Star like shinny object hovered & put out cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my apartment watching tv when my eye was caught by something in the dark nigh sky at 9:33pm.  the object appeared over quebec in the nw not too high in the sky and appeared to be dancing around but in one area, not moving too far left or right but also up and down as if it was hyper.  it was at first an orangy-red color much like the big orange orbs i saw over quebec a few years back but this object seemed smaller although it was further north than the large orange orbs i saw before.

i watched this object just moving around in one area changing directions really fast but staying within the same spot.  as i watched it close to when it seemed to disappear either through the low sitting clouds or it just vanished, not sure which, but in a half hour it was gone.  i haven't seen it back yet and it's almost 11pm now.

i viewed it first with the naked eye and binoculars and with the binoculars it still appeared to dance around changing directions from left to right and up and down in a varied pattern but in the one small area.  hyper describes it.  towards the end of the half hour it appeared more white and light grey than red/orange.

i do believe it was changing shape as well but i was too far away to see it and a telescope would have answered that question i'm sure.

there is a small island with a building on it that they use for testing the river on the ontario side of the river and just before i saw the strange light/objects i saw what looked like some type of signalling light (it was bright and very large) that was shining out into the river but not facing the object in the sky across from the signal.  it seemed strange to me as i have never seen this 'signal light' before and then all of a sudden i spotted the object in the sky over quebec across the river.  just seemed odd.  now they do river rescue and things i believe from that island but usually then you see a search boat maybe go out but nothing happened.  maybe they were just testing their equipment, i don't know.  just seemed odd.

i couldn't really make out a shape of the orange/light grey/white object above but at first it looked starlike but because of all the dancing and sharp turns up and down and sideways it was hard to tell.  there also could have been more than one in the same area and my feeling is that there was but i couldn't see for sure because it all seemed to be so random in movement that it was hard to tell if it was one morphing or more than one playing around, couldn't tell.

there was no noise and i was out on my balcony but possibly closer in quebec there was, couldn't tell from this distance which is way over a mile i would think.

i think that is about it.  hope someone else saw it and will report in.
content.summary: Hyper object sited over nw quebec near river but over land.  object changed colors and 'danced in one spot' for nearly a half hour before either landing or disappearing under low clouds.
